entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023
